title: Moonweavers - Savage, J.T_.epub
description:
J.T. Savage's 'Moonweavers is a rollercoaster ride of doom. Read as Frank and his entourage fight for all humankind as werewolves invade the planet. Not ordinary werewolves, no. These werewolves want the world for themselves and will stop anything that stands in their way. But luckily for Frank, the elite guard lend a hand. Who will be victorious? Find out NOW in this sci-fi horror thriller. It will weave into your veins and not let go. Be forewarned. The moonweavers are coming and there is no escape.
Genre: Sci-fi/Horror/Thriller
